charaepi_ch0154_00_kikuno/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking along a
mountain path when [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] suddenly heard a loud
crashing sound.
charaepi_ch0154_00_kikuno/2301_1101_0200:
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="He" F="She" ] looked over in surprise to where the sound
came from...
charaepi_ch0154_00_kikuno/2301_1101_0300: and a Hippowdon leaped out at [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ]!
charaepi_ch0154_00_kikuno/2301_1201_0500: I’m so sorry to have startled you.
charaepi_ch0154_00_kikuno/2301_1201_0600:
We were just going for a stroll when Hippowdon
got a bit overexcited.
charaepi_ch0154_00_kikuno/2301_1201_0700:
Ah, Hippowdon. Now she’s blasting sand and
trying to create a twister.
charaepi_ch0154_00_kikuno/2301_0401_0900: Oh, dear child, it’s nothing to be afraid of.
charaepi_ch0154_00_kikuno/2301_0402_1100: Ahaha! Thank you! Wait a moment—Hippowdon!
charaepi_ch0154_00_kikuno/2301_1201_1200:
Now, now! Where were you trying to sneak
off to?
charaepi_ch0154_00_kikuno/2301_1201_1300:
Oh, this Hippowdon. She’s just brimming with
curiosity, and she’s quite a handful. I can’t take
my eyes off her for a second.
charaepi_ch0154_00_kikuno/2301_1201_1400: Oh, stop! This isn’t a game of tag, you know!
charaepi_ch0154_00_kikuno/2301_1201_1500:
I’m trying to have a nice conversation with
[Name:PlayerNickname ] here!
charaepi_ch0154_00_kikuno/2301_1201_1800:
I think she’s finally gotten her fill of play for now.
I’m so sorry for all the commotion.
charaepi_ch0154_00_kikuno/2301_1201_1900: Whew! That was some good exercise!
charaepi_ch0154_00_kikuno/2301_0402_2300: Ahaha! She really is a cutie, isn’t she?
charaepi_ch0154_00_kikuno/2301_1201_2400: I’m very happy to hear that we look like a family!
charaepi_ch0154_00_kikuno/2301_1201_2500:
Because I do think of my partner Pokémon as a
dear child of mine...
charaepi_ch0154_00_kikuno/2301_1201_2600:
Actually, this Hippowdon used to be too wild and
rough. She lived alone, not part of any herd.
charaepi_ch0154_00_kikuno/2301_1201_2700:
Perhaps she thought that because she was stronger
than all the others, she could live just fine on
her own.
charaepi_ch0154_00_kikuno/2301_0301_2800: Do you think she was lonely?
charaepi_ch0154_00_kikuno/2301_0401_2900:
Her mind is as strong as her body, so it probably
didn’t occur to her to feel lonely. Still, it seemed
like such a waste.
charaepi_ch0154_00_kikuno/2301_0402_3100: Yes, living all alone can be a sad, difficult thing.
charaepi_ch0154_00_kikuno/2301_1201_3200:
As soon as I encountered this girl, I realized she
could have become so much stronger if she had
played and practiced with her herd.
charaepi_ch0154_00_kikuno/2301_1201_3300:
She kept threatening me with her huge mouth,
trying to scare me away, but...I wanted to show
her that she’s not alone.
charaepi_ch0154_00_kikuno/2301_1201_3400: And little by little, we grew closer.
charaepi_ch0154_00_kikuno/2301_0401_3700:
I believed in this Hippowdon—that while she may
try to startle people, she’d never hurt anyone.
charaepi_ch0154_00_kikuno/2301_0402_3900:
I realized that deep down, she really was lonely,
so I couldn’t just leave her on her own.
charaepi_ch0154_00_kikuno/2301_1201_4000:
The more you put your trust in someone, the more
they can trust you as well.
charaepi_ch0154_00_kikuno/2301_1201_4100:
I made up my mind to keep believing in
Hippowdon until she believed in me, too.
charaepi_ch0154_00_kikuno/2301_1201_4200:
Now the only time she bares her teeth at me is
when I’m brushing them.
charaepi_ch0154_00_kikuno/2301_1201_4300:
Ahaha! We really do have a bond like a parent
and child!
charaepi_ch0154_00_kikuno/2301_1201_4400: And I think that’s a wonderful thing!
